artist: Artist: Kiki Smith; Publisher: Pace Editions, New York
description: ballerina wearing a feathered headdress, leaning her arms toward the right, against a black background; collaged tissue paper skirt with spots of gold glitter; received in silver frame
medium: Etching with aquatint and collage of tissue paper and glitter
text: Though perhaps best known as a sculptor, Kiki Smith regularly works in drawing, installation art, and printmaking, a medium she considers of of central importance to her creative practice. In this mixed intaglio print, Smith likely casts herself in the role of the ballerina, dancing on point while wearing an elegant dress that accentuates the grace and beauty of her performative movement. More metaphor than narrative, the portrayal is a visual manifestation of traditional feminity and attention-focusing charisma.
title: Ballerina (Stretching right)
